data.lyric:
[ti:Lonely If You Are]
[ar:Chase Rice]
[al:Lonely If You Are]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Lonely If You Are - Chase Rice
[00:11.88]If it's Friday you know I'll be
[00:14.68]Kickin' back with the boys down at Santa's pub
[00:17.31]But don't hesitate don't even think about waiting nah just type it up
[00:22.42]Yeah I'm ready if you're ready or wonderin'
[00:25.27]Stop thinking hit send
[00:27.52]Doesn't matter if it's last call from a late night sidewalk
[00:30.75]A little too buzzed a little too drunk
[00:33.45]You could have your hair down all curled up on the couch
[00:36.58]And the quiet ain't loud enough nah
[00:39.07]It could be A.M. or P.M.
[00:42.02]It could be middle of the week or the weekend baby
[00:45.37]It ain't too late or too far
[00:47.82]Just call me 'cause I'm lonely
[00:51.21]If you are if you are
[00:54.85]Yeah I'm lonely if you are
[00:56.81]If you are if you are yeah
[01:00.50]Yeah I'm lonely if you are
[01:02.59]If it's Monday and it's over
[01:05.44]You know the show your girls all come over for
[01:08.27]And the red wine's getting lower
[01:11.07]And your last friend's out the door
[01:13.24]When there's no more roses to go around
[01:16.11]Hit me up girl you know I'm down
[01:18.13]It doesn't matter if it's last call from a late night sidewalk
[01:21.69]A little too buzzed a little too drunk
[01:24.13]You could have your hair down all curled up on the couch
[01:27.36]And the quiet ain't loud enough nah
[01:29.98]It could be A.M. or P.M.
[01:32.86]It could be middle of the week or the weekend baby
[01:36.17]It ain't too late or too far
[01:38.64]Just call me 'cause I'm lonely
[01:42.13]If you are if you are
[01:45.62]Yeah I'm lonely if you are
[01:47.68]If you are if you are
[01:51.28]Yeah I'm lonely if you are
[01:52.74]Oh let me love the lonely right out of you
[01:57.76]Oh let me love the lonely right out of you
[02:03.23]Oh yeah if you're out there and lonely girl I'm lonely too
[02:09.09]So let me love the lonely right out of you
[02:16.00]It doesn't matter if it's last call from a late night sidewalk
[02:19.55]Little too buzzed a little too drunk
[02:22.07]You could have your hair down all curled up on the couch
[02:25.29]And the quiet ain't loud enough no
[02:28.05]It could be A.M. or P.M.
[02:30.64]It could be middle of the week or the weekend baby
[02:34.02]It ain't too late or too far
[02:36.54]Just call me 'cause I'm lonely
[02:39.91]If you are if you are yeah
[02:43.58]Yeah I'm lonely if you are
[02:45.64]If you are if you are yeah
[02:49.16]Oh I'm lonely if you are
data.trans:
[ti:Lonely If You Are]
[ar:Chase Rice]
[al:Lonely If You Are]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:11.88]如果今天是星期五 你知道
[00:14.68]我和朋友在圣诞老人酒吧酣快畅饮
[00:17.31]但是不会犹豫 甚至不想等待 直接拨通电话
[00:22.42]我做好准备 无论你你蓄势待发或着犹豫不决
[00:25.27]别再思索 按下发送键
[00:27.52]就算这是你深夜漫步街头时的最后一通电话也无妨
[00:30.75]喝到醉醺醺的 头晕目眩
[00:33.45]你可以放下秀发 蜷缩在沙发上
[00:36.58]寂静无声 不算喧嚣
[00:39.07]无论是清晨还是下午
[00:42.02]无论是工作日还是周末 宝贝
[00:45.37]再晚再远都无所谓
[00:47.82]打电话给我吧 因为我孤独寂寞
[00:51.21]如果你像我一样孤独
[00:54.85]你和我一样孤独寂寞
[00:56.81]如果你像我一样孤独
[01:00.50]你和我一样孤独寂寞
[01:02.59]如果现在是星期一 一天结束了
[01:05.44]你知道你的姐妹会欢聚一堂
[01:08.27]满瓶红酒慢慢见底
[01:11.07]你的最后一位朋友离开你家
[01:13.24]当你身边无人陪伴时
[01:16.11]打电话给我吧 女孩 你知道十分乐意
[01:18.13]就算这是你深夜漫步街头时的最后一通电话也无妨

[01:42.13]如果你像我一样孤独
[01:45.62]你和我一样孤独寂寞
[01:47.68]如果你像我一样孤独
[01:51.28]你和我一样孤独寂寞
[01:52.74]让我用爱温暖孤寂的你
[01:57.76]让我用爱温暖孤寂的你
